'''Chief Echoing-Strike''' is a character and creature in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A particularly large [Lagufaeth Redfin](/lagufaethRedfinDeadfire/) leading a boar hunting party.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =Encountered during the [Boa Hika Pass](/boaHikaPass/) scripted inteaction, leading a few other lagufaeths on a boar hunt.
}}
